markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Gosreg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=687)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Gosregs are agents of the Dominion of the Black that insinuate themselves into humanoid societies to foster the goals of their sinister alien masters. They act as spies and special forces that can mingle with humanoid society while enacting plans for the rest of the Dominion in secret.

 In their natural forms, gosregs dart about in a jerky gallop due to their stumpy legs and gangly arms. They take on the appearances of humanoids to infiltrate societies, and they drop their disguises only when they feel they are ultimately compromised and must resort to physical violence to protect their agendas. Their brain-like heads and bestial legs suggest a potential link with a similar Dominion of the Black agent: the dreaded [intellect devourer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=703).

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Gosreg.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Gosreg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=687)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +21; darkvision, thoughtsense 60 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +24, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +22, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +23, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +6

**Con** +3

**Int** +6

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +7
</row>

**Thoughtsense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The gosreg senses a creature's mental essence as a precise sense with the listed range; it cannot sense [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creatures with thoughtsense.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +22 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 195

**Immunities**
[confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5)

**Resistances**
mental 10

**Unsettled Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) 30 feet. Gosregs project a field of discordant energy that unsettles the minds of thinking creatures. Any non-[mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creature within 30 feet of a gosreg takes a –1 status penalty to Will saves.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +21 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d10+7 piercing plus 1d10 mental

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d8+7 slashing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **2nd**
[Undetectable Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=348)
- **4th**
[Nightmare](/Spells.aspx?ID=208), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (×3)
- **5th**
[Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=314), [Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=327)
- **6th**
[Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The gosreg takes on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage modifiers with its Strikes, but it might change the damage type its Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

**Mind Bolt** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) A gosreg concentrates its field of discordant mental energy and projects it into the mind of an enemy within 60 feet. The target takes 6d6 mental damage (DC 30 basic Will save). On a critical failure, the creature is also [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Dominion Plots</title>

While Golarion largely survived the events of the Doomsday Dawn, the threat of the Dominion of the Black is far from over. This alien conglomerate recognizes that it needs to understand the vastness of humanoids in the universe to better enact their plans, and certain nihilistic scholars suggest that the Doomsday Dawn was never intended to end the world, but instead served its primary goal of setting the stage for an even more devastating invasion from the Dominion in the near future.
</aside>
name: Gosreg
